Welcome to Tracim!

Collaborative information management for collective intelligence.

Tracim is a free software for collaboration, information management and knowledge management that has been created over 20 years of experience in the service of collective intelligence.

Tracim is available in:

  • Deutsch
  • English
  • Español
  • Français
  • Norsk
  • Português
  • العربية

Tracim® is a registered trademark of the Algoo SAS company.

Tracim is a FLOSS software made with ❤️ by Algoo SAS

Note: this homepage is fully customizable - look at the documentation!
